script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.Pirate.Order.Weaken
script.description: Pirate Guild - Base Order : Attack military assets

line.comment: * Base AI : Find and attack a military asset
* Fix 1 : Improved signal handling
* Fix 2 : Selection mechanism rewritten (better, and less cpu used)
* Fix 3 : Corrected targeting of friendly player ships
* Added : Warns player if noto +15k
* Added : PNN Support
* Added : Blinking target name
* Added (Nicoman35): ADS support
* Added (Nicoman35): Temporarily mark target station with kill signals and variables (total distance dependent)
* Added (Nicoman35): Formation cohesion; maintain formation OOS
* LU Update (Solarahawk): made ADS permanent
* Setup class array for targets depending on available fighters aboard pirate guild base
* Fix 3 : Corrected targeting of friendly player ships
* Fix 2 : Selection mechanism rewritten (better, and less cpu used)
* Debug output
* ECS output
* Added : Warns player if notor +12k
* Added: (Nicoman35): Calculate total distance to target, to obtain reasonable duration of marking target with kill signals
* Fix 1 : Improved signal handling, temporarily mark target ship with kill signals and variables
* Initiate attack

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Base Order : Attack military assets
Base AI : Find and attack a military asset
Fix 2 : Selection mechanism rewritten (better, and less cpu used)
Fix 3 : Corrected targeting of friendly player ships
Added (Nicoman35): Temporarily mark target station with kill signals and variables (total distance dependent)
Added (Nicoman35): Formation cohesion; maintain formation OOS
Setup class array for targets depending on available fighters aboard pirate guild base
Fix 3 : Corrected targeting of friendly player ships
Fix 2 : Selection mechanism rewritten (better, and less cpu used)
Added: (Nicoman35): Calculate total distance to target, to obtain reasonable duration of marking target with kill signals
Fix 1 : Improved signal handling, temporarily mark target ship with kill signals and variables
